quote: The time to make up your mind about people, is never.
author: Philip Barry

quote: Work doesn't work without play.
author: Shonda Rhimes

quote: Reach out your hand if your cup be empty, if your cup is full may it be again.
author: Robert Hunter

quote: Our heads are round so thought can change direction.
author: Francis Picabia

quote: In a time of destruction, create something.
author: Maxine Hong Kingston

quote: We can always begin again.
author: Sharon Salzberg

quote: A journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: The only way to be truly happy is to make others happy.
author: William Carlos Williams

quote: Love yourself first and everything else falls into line.
author: Lucille Ball

quote: The most effective way to do it, is to do it.
author: Amelia Earhart

quote: The time is always ripe to do right.
author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quote: The greater the difficulty, the more the glory in surmounting it.
author: Epicurus

quote: Love is space and time made perceptible to the heart.
author: Marcel Proust

quote: Truth is proper and beautiful in all times and in all places.
author: Frederick Douglass

quote: The heart is wiser than the intellect.
author: Josiah Gilbert Holland

quote: Love all, trust a few, do wrong to none.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: Sometimes you win, sometimes you learn.
author: John Maxwell

quote: Hope springs eternal in the human breast.
author: Alexander Pope

quote: Not what we have but what we enjoy constitutes our abundance.
author: Jean Antoine Petit-Senn

quote: The secret of life is to fall seven times and to get up eight times.
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: Men who are in earnest are not afraid of consequences.
author: Marcus Garvey

quote: All you have to do is write one true sentence. Write the truest sentence that you know.
author: Ernest Hemingway

quote: No wise man ever wished to be younger.
author: Jonathan Swift

quote: Happiness is not a goal, it’s a by-product.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: Don't wait. The time will never be just right.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: To be careful with people and with words was a rare and beautiful thing.
author: Benjamin Alire Sáenz

quote: Diligence is the mother of good fortune.
author: Miguel de Cervantes

quote: You'll never find a rainbow if you're looking down.
author: Charlie Chaplin

quote: It is not easy to be a pioneer - but oh, it is fascinating!
author: Elizabeth Blackwell

quote: Mind is a flexible mirror, adjust it, to see a better world.
author: Amit Ray

quote: Courage is very important. Like a muscle, it is strengthened by use.
author: Ruth Gordon

quote: Nobody has ever measured, not even poets, how much the heart can hold.
author: Zelda Fitzgerald

quote: Sometimes you win, sometimes you lose, sometimes it rains.
author: Ron Shelton

quote: What I am is good enough if I would only be it openly.
author: Carl Rogers

quote: Too many of us are not living our dreams because we are living our fears.
author: Les Brown

quote: What do we live for, if not to make life less difficult for each other?
author: George Eliot

quote: We know what we are, but know not what we may be.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: The world always seems brighter when you've just made something that wasn't there before.
author: Neil Gaiman

quote: When we sow a seed, we plant a narrative of future possibility.
author: Sue Stuart-Smith

quote: All our dreams can come true if we have the courage to pursue them.
author: Walt Disney

quote: If you do not tell the truth about yourself you cannot tell it about other people.
author: Virginia Woolf

quote: Luck is what happens when preparation meets opportunity.
author: Seneca

quote: Education must not simply teach work - it must teach Life.
author: W.E.B. Du Bois

quote: The only difference between success and failure is the ability to take action.
author: Alexander Graham Bell

quote: If they don't give you a seat at the table, bring a folding chair.
author: Shirley Chisholm

quote: I can be someone’s and still be my own.
author: Shel Silverstein

quote: Where there is love and inspiration, I don’t think you can go wrong.
author: Ella Fitzgerald

quote: If you invest in beauty, it will remain with you all the days of your life.
author: Frank Lloyd Wright

quote: In the depths of Winter, I finally learned that within me there lay an invincible summer.
author: Albert Camus

quote: Forgiveness is just another name for freedom.
author: Byron Katie

quote: What good is warmth without cold to give it sweetness?
author: John Steinbeck

quote: Blessed are the hearts that can bend; they shall never be broken.
author: Albert Camus

quote: Difficulties strengthen the mind, as labor does the body.
author: Seneca

quote: In three words, I can sum up everything I’ve learned about life: It goes on.
author: Robert Frost

quote: To love oneself is the beginning of a life-long romance.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Life can only be understood backwards; but it must be lived forwards.
author: Søren Kierkegaard

quote: The willingness to show up changes us. It makes us a little braver each time.
author: Brené Brown

quote: Be happy, take care of your teeth, always let your conscience be your guide.
author: Patti Smith

quote: It's one of the greatest gifts you can give yourself, to forgive.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: When I grow up, I’m gonna look up from my phone and see my life.
author: Phoebe Bridgers

quote: Trust your gut. Forgive yourself. Be grateful.
author: Cheryl Strayed

quote: The great thing about getting older is that you don't lose all the other ages you've been.
author: Madeleine L'Engle

quote: He who has a why to live for can bear almost any how.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Courage is the price that life exacts for granting peace.
author: Amelia Earhart

quote: The first wealth is health.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: A small act is worth a million thoughts.
author: Ai Weiwei

quote: Logic will get you from A to B. Imagination will take you everywhere.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: You don't always have to be doing something. You can just be, and that's plenty.
author: Alice Walker

quote: Nothing is worth more than laughter. It is strength to laugh and to abandon oneself, to be light.
author: Frida Kahlo

quote: There is so much to be grateful for, words are poor things.
author: Marilynne Robinson

quote: I would rather have 30 minutes of wonderful than a lifetime of nothing special.
author: Robert Harling

quote: Don't move the way fear makes you move.
author: Rumi

quote: What is happiness except the simple harmony between a man and the life he leads?
author: Albert Camus

quote: Patience is bitter, but its fruit is sweet.
author: Jean-Jacques Rousseau

quote: When you run into something interesting, drop everything else and study it.
author: B. F. Skinner

quote: It's the simple things in life that are the most extraordinary.
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: Fall in love with the masterpiece, and also the paint on the floor.
author: Morgan Harper Nichols

quote: Time you enjoy wasting is not wasted time.
author: Marthe Troly-Curtin

quote: The beauty is that through disappointment you can gain clarity, and with clarity comes conviction and true originality.
author: Conan O'Brien

quote: It is only after the deepest darkness that the greatest joy can come.
author: Malcolm X

quote: Genius, like humanity, rusts for want of use.
author: William Hazlitt

quote: Seek first the virtues of the mind; and other things either will come, or will not be wanted.
author: Francis Bacon

quote: Nothing succeeds like success. Get a little success, and then just get a little more.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: Every gift from a friend is a wish for your happiness.
author: Richard Bach

quote: Whatever you are, try to be a good one.
author: William Makepeace Thackeray

quote: I learned that courage was not the absence of fear, but the triumph over it.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: I'm not afraid of storms, for I'm learning how to sail my ship.
author: Louisa May Alcott

quote: Letting go gives us freedom, and freedom is the only condition for happiness.
author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quote: Chance favors only the prepared mind.
author: Louis Pasteur

quote: He has achieved success who has lived well, laughed often, and loved much.
author: Bessie Anderson Stanley

quote: Inspiration usually comes during work, rather than before it.
author: Madeleine L'Engle

quote: Who looks outside, dreams; who looks inside, awakes.
author: Carl Jung

quote: Stay close to any sounds that make you glad you are alive.
author: Hafez

quote: To affect the quality of the day, that is the highest of arts.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: You miss 100 percent of the shots you don't take.
author: Wayne Gretzky

quote: One sees great things from the valley; only small things from the peak.
author: G.K. Chesterton

quote: Success is a collection of problems solved.
author: I. M. Pei

quote: Wisely, and slow. They stumble that run fast.
author: William Shakespeare
